no-restricted-imports.name: vitest
no-restricted-imports.message: This project uses Jest, not Vitest. Use jest.mock() instead of vi.mock(), and @testing-library/react instead of @testing-library/react/vitest.

no-restricted-properties.message: Use jest.mock() instead of vi.mock() - this project uses Jest exclusively.
Use jest.fn() instead of vi.fn() - this project uses Jest exclusively.
Use jest.describe() or global describe() instead of vi.describe() - this project uses Jest exclusively.
Use jest.test() or global test() instead of vi.test() - this project uses Jest exclusively.
Use jest.expect() or global expect() instead of vi.expect() - this project uses Jest exclusively.
